fieldOverrides.formula:
'Congratulations on the closing of your line of credit!' + '

' + 'Attached please find your Proof of Funds Letter and Data Tape Template. The Data Tape Template should be completed on assets you’d like to put on the line and included in each advance request.' + '

' + 'Please upload Funding/Advance requests directly to the portal at: https://corevest.force.com/portal' + '

' + '$'+IF( Opportunity.Deposit_Amount__c >= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(Opportunity.Deposit_Amount__c / 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF( Opportunity.Deposit_Amount__c >= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Opportunity.Deposit_Amount__c / 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Opportunity.Deposit_Amount__c)), 3) & "." & IF( MOD(Opportunity.Deposit_Amount__c , 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD(Opportunity.Deposit_Amount__c , 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD(Opportunity.Deposit_Amount__c , 1), 2) * 100, 99)) ) +' Deposit Collected' + '

' + '$'+IF( Opportunity.Calculated_Origination_Fee__c>= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(Opportunity.Calculated_Origination_Fee__c/ 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF( Opportunity.Calculated_Origination_Fee__c>= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Opportunity.Calculated_Origination_Fee__c/ 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Opportunity.Calculated_Origination_Fee__c)), 3) & "." & IF( MOD(Opportunity.Calculated_Origination_Fee__c, 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD(Opportunity.Calculated_Origination_Fee__c, 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD(Opportunity.Calculated_Origination_Fee__c, 1), 2) * 100, 99)) ) +' Origination Fee' + '

' + '$'+IF( Opportunity.Entity_Search_Fee__c >= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(Opportunity.Entity_Search_Fee__c / 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF( Opportunity.Entity_Search_Fee__c >= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Opportunity.Entity_Search_Fee__c / 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Opportunity.Entity_Search_Fee__c)), 3) & "." & IF( MOD(Opportunity.Entity_Search_Fee__c , 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD(Opportunity.Entity_Search_Fee__c , 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD(Opportunity.Entity_Search_Fee__c , 1), 2) * 100, 99)) ) +' Entity Searches' + '

' + '$'+IF( Opportunity.UCC_1_Filing_Fee__c >= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(Opportunity.UCC_1_Filing_Fee__c / 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF( Opportunity.UCC_1_Filing_Fee__c >= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Opportunity.UCC_1_Filing_Fee__c / 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Opportunity.UCC_1_Filing_Fee__c)), 3) & "." & IF( MOD(Opportunity.UCC_1_Filing_Fee__c , 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD(Opportunity.UCC_1_Filing_Fee__c , 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD(Opportunity.UCC_1_Filing_Fee__c , 1), 2) * 100, 99)) ) +' UCC Filing' + '

' + '$'+IF( Opportunity.Legal_Fee__c >= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR(Opportunity.Legal_Fee__c / 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF( Opportunity.Legal_Fee__c >= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Opportunity.Legal_Fee__c / 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR(Opportunity.Legal_Fee__c)), 3) & "." & IF( MOD(Opportunity.Legal_Fee__c , 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD(Opportunity.Legal_Fee__c , 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD(Opportunity.Legal_Fee__c , 1), 2) * 100, 99)) ) +' Legal Fee' + '

' + '━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━' + '

' + 'Thank you for your business. We look forward to working with you!'
'Congratulations - Line of Credit Funding Documents - Closed - ' + Opportunity.Deal_Loan_Number__c + ' - ' + Opportunity.Name
